description: This file defines interfaces related to 'trigger' functionality within the icrule component, including function declarations for freeing and parsing trigger data structures, along with include directives for dependencies.

methods.name: icrule_free_trigger
methods.description: Frees the memory allocated for a trigger object.

methods.name: icrule_parse_trigger_list
methods.description: Parses an XML node to populate a list of triggers.
